WorkItem.Description:
Visual Studio specific issues are polluting 'real' issues linked to the language semantics and the transpiler.

Could you please separate issues in at least 3 sections:

1. language
1. transpiler
1. Visual Studio

Like many, we do not use Visual Studio.

Also, it would be interesting to use a full fledged issue tracker so that we can monitor progress on resolution and comment/test as things are moving along
WorkItem.Summary: Issue on Issues: move Visual Studio specific issues to another location

Comments.Message: We're on GitHub now :) You can filter much more easily and we're going to try to tag VS specific issues as such.
